name: Classic Hikes in the Canadian Rockies
categories: Classic Hikes in the Canadian Rockies
description: Find 63 of the best backpacking trips and day hikes in Banff, Jasper, Yoho, Kootenay, Mt. Robson, Mt. Assiniboine, Waterton, Kananaskis, and Akamina-Kishinena Parks. This edition is revised to include detailed starting points, route descriptions, and a colour map for each hike. Descriptions contain information about history, geology, wildlife, wildflowers, and options for side trips an diversions. Colour Includes tips on equipment, food, drinking water, backcountry etiquette, minimum impact travel, hiking with children, and safety tips for travelling in bear country. Foreword by Robert Bateman.
